channel.title: Bingoing question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bingoing question"

item.title: Re: Bingoing question
item.content:encoded: Thanks, but I've already found out the answer to my question. You still get Anonymous, even if you have a Reversing Hourglass on.

item.title: Re: Bingoing question
item.content:encoded: Getting bingo'd doesn't negate hourglasses. I don't know whether or not your can get Anon while hourglassed.

item.title: Re: Bingoing question
item.content:encoded:
While I can't specifically answer your question I can say that I got Right by note bingo'ing someone who had what I think is a reversing hourglass active. It said they shrugged off the bingo towards the bottom of the page, however Hyuk + Note still gave me Right.

-Kedoch

item.title: Bingoing question
item.content:encoded:
Just a simple question: If I have a reversing hourglass activated, and I'm bingo'd with a note page, will I still get anonymous? Or would I have to be bingo'd twice?

Also, if it does not count, can I remove a reversing hourglass by getting myself bingo'd? For example, by failing a bingo attempt.
